biotools.summary: Fast k-mer distance estimation enabled by mash to calculate core and accessory distances between all pairs of isolates of bacteria in a collection. By clustering these distances into ‘within-strain’ and ‘between-strain’ distances a network of within-strain comparisons can be constructed.

bioschemas.name: PopPUNK
